channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ Yale University on HF Daily Paper Reviews by AI

item.title: MCTS-RAG: Enhancing Retrieval-Augmented Generation with Monte Carlo Tree Search
item.description: MCTS-RAG: Combines Monte Carlo Tree Search with Retrieval-Augmented Generation to enhance small LMs’ reasoning on complex tasks.

item.title: PHYSICS: Benchmarking Foundation Models on University-Level Physics Problem Solving
item.description: PHYSICS: A new benchmark reveals foundation models struggle with university-level physics, highlighting needs for improved reasoning and knowledge integration.

item.title: MedAgentsBench: Benchmarking Thinking Models and Agent Frameworks for Complex Medical Reasoning
item.description: MEDAGENTSBENCH: a new benchmark for assessing complex medical reasoning in LLMs, revealing performance gaps and cost-effective strategies.

item.title: SynthLight: Portrait Relighting with Diffusion Model by Learning to Re-render Synthetic Faces
item.description: SynthLight: A novel diffusion model relights portraits realistically by learning to re-render synthetic faces, generalizing remarkably well to real photographs.
